mapper.select: select t.tasklist_no as tasklistNo, task_no as taskNo, task_name as taskName, task_start as taskStart, task_end as taskEnd, task_label as taskLabel, task_state as taskState, task_contents as taskContents, task_order as taskOrder, task_regdate as taskRegdate, task_writer as taskWriter from task t join tasklist tl on t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no where project_no = #{projectNo} and tl.tasklist_no = #{tasklistNo} and task_state != 'del' order by t.task_order
